city: # URBAN HEAT ISLAND CATALOG - Type-6 Validation Pilot
# Purpose: Experiment A from falsification plan (docs/utac_type6_falsification_plan.md)
#   - ΔT_night: Nighttime land surface temp anomaly (K)
#   - H_cap: Building material heat capacity proxy (dimensionless)
# 4. Inverted sigmoid better: ΔAIC > 10 for inverted vs. classical
# PILOT CITIES (4 cities × 2 seasons = 8 data points minimum)
# Goal: Diverse climates and urban morphologies

notes: Critical regime; extreme β spike near threshold; inverted sigmoid preferred
Far from threshold; β relaxes to ~4.2 (Φ³ fixpoint)
Year-round heat stress; extreme β; nocturnal trap mechanism active
Below threshold; classical sigmoid; moderate β
Far from threshold; gentle transition; low β
Very far from threshold; low β; minimal heat stress
Extreme overshoot; highest β; massive cooling infrastructure load
Relaxation to mid-β; classical sigmoid recovers
